ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | climeq.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | climeq.2 | |- ( ph -> F e. V ) |
| 3 |  | climeq.3 | |- ( ph -> G e. W ) |
| 4 |  | climeq.5 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | climeq.6 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = ( G ` k ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 2, 5 | #P_clim2 | |- ( ph -> ( F ~~> A <-> ( A e. CC /\ A. x e. RR+ E. y e. Z A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` y ) ( ( G ` k ) e. CC /\ ( abs ` ( ( G ` k ) - A ) ) < x ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) = ( G ` k ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 4, 3, 7 | #P_clim2 | |- ( ph -> ( G ~~> A <-> ( A e. CC /\ A. x e. RR+ E. y e. Z A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` y ) ( ( G ` k ) e. CC /\ ( abs ` ( ( G ` k ) - A ) ) < x ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_bitr4d | |- ( ph -> ( F ~~> A <-> G ~~> A ) ) |
